record.id: field.name="sp.map.operator.prop" and file.name="idolserverinfo" and term=NULL and format.name="idol.monitor" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: sp.map.operator.prop
record.file.name: idolserverinfo
record.format.name: idol.monitor

brief.brief: Provide which field in SM Operator is corresponding to LDAP attribute "sAMAccountName"

detail.detail: This field is to configure the user mapping between SharePoint and SM user account for SharePoint On-premises if you want to use OmniGroupServer for access control, as SharePoint On-premises use this attribute as primary user account name.
you don't need to configure this field if SharePoint Online is used, as operator "email" attribute will be used for user mapping.
